tag_list: social-media, new-media, small-business, large-business, marketing, communications, portfolio-management
overview:
Social Media and Marketing. Kathleen Keith, through her company Shasta Peak Marketing, is helping small and large businesses make a quick and profitable transition to new media and social media marketing. There are many benefits that come with a strategic social media strategy, most notably increased profits, social proof, brand awareness, competitive edge and market domination that help customers get what they want: quality information, excellent customer care, and quality products that solve a need.

Kathleen is well-known for her extensive background/skills in running small businesses, providing state of the art portfolio and asset management to California school districts, to providing all manner of real estate acquisition and development to large divisions of city government, and multi-nationals/Fortune 500 corporations.

relationships.title: Sr. Project Manager/Real Estate/Overland Pacific & Cutler
